text:
House Republicans are working to hold the Chinese Communist Party accountable for their lies and for causing the coronavirus to be spread around the world.
 
Yet, Nancy Pelosi claims that efforts to hold China accountable are a "diversion" ↓ https://t.co/D7pCXRJjub
